scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,packages "bun run --filter web dev" "bun run --filter @repo/qa build -- --watch"
scripts.build: bun run --filter @repo/qa build && bun run --filter web build
scripts.qa: bun run lint:all && bun run typecheck:all && bun run format:all
scripts.lint:all: bun run --filter './apps/*' lint:pkg && bun run --filter './packages/*' lint:pkg
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run --filter './apps/*' typecheck:pkg && bun run --filter './packages/*' typecheck:pkg
scripts.format:all: bun run --filter './apps/*' format:pkg && bun run --filter './packages/*' format:pkg
